thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 70 of 7274
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text:
BestBuy can sometimes match the B&H price on certain major items; some cameras and a few lenses, but B&H always has what you want at a price that can't be beat even if equaled. They have everything an amateur or pro could want. They are totally expert on what they sell, and they are scrupulously honest. I am a camera/equipment junky and have been a frequent customer since 1970.
If this sounds like a paid aid, I happily endorse them for free.
